content: crochet something cozy and warm to snuggle up with on cold days the zig and zag blanket uses a combination of the single_crochet and spike stitch to create a beautiful zig-zag triangle pattern the border is crocheted at the same time as the body of the blanket to make things easier the beauty of this blanket is that it looks more complicated than it is it follows a 4-row repeat pattern so once you get the hang of the first few row it s smooth sailing there are step-by-step pictures and helpful tips included in the free pattern and a complete video tutorial included in the pdf i hope you enjoy making and using your blanket > the free pattern for the lapghan blanket 44 x 52 can be found **here** 1 along with instructions to create a custom sized blanket > buy 2 patterns get 1 free with coupon code freepattern add all 3 patterns to your cart and use the coupon code discount will be applied at checkout > **pattern bundle - 4 textured crochet blanket patterns including this one for $10 https //www ravelry com/redeem/this-pixie-creates sale=345536** skill level advanced beginner language english crochet terminology us terms video tutorials yes a complete video tutorial is included in the pdf * the pdf includes instructions for 7 blanket sizes baby 36 x 36 lapghan 44 x 52 small throw 52 x 63 medium throw 60 x 72 large throw 70 x 80 queen 82 x 91 and king 90 x 91 * the printable pdf is a total of 15 pages * a step-by-step video tutorial is included in the pdf to help you with the 4-row pattern repeat > other details * 6 5mm and 7 0mm crochet hook needed * medium 4 worsted weight yarn is used for this design * pattern has been tech edited 1 https //thispixiecreates com/how-to-crochet-the-zig-and-zag-stitch-blanket/
